00025 #ifndef _BASE_CACHEFILE_
00026 #define _BASE_CACHEFILE_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/VFile>
00030 #include <base/path_not_found>
00031 #include <base/io_error>
00032 
00033 
00034 #include <string>
00035 
00036 namespace base {
00037 
00038 class CacheFile : public VFile
00039 {
00040 public:
00041   virtual ~CacheFile();
00042 
00043   virtual String className() const { return String("CacheFile"); }
00044   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewNamedObj(className()) CacheFile(*this); }
00045 
00046   virtual const PathName path() const { return PathName(String()+PathName::separator); }
00047   virtual const PathName pathName() const { return path()+pathname.name(); }
00048 
00049   virtual String extension() const { return pathname.extension(); }  // the file's extension (e.g. .png)
00050 
00051   virtual std::istream&  istream() const throw(io_error);
00052   virtual std::ostream&  ostream() const throw(io_error);
00053   virtual std::iostream& iostream(std::iostream::openmode mode = (std::iostream::in | std::iostream::out) ) const throw(io_error);
00054 
00055   virtual void close() const throw(io_error); // close the file (can be re-opened again via istream/ostream/iostream() )
00056 
00057 protected:
00058   ref<VFile> actualFile;
00059 
00060   CacheFile(const CacheFile& f) 
00061     : VFile(f), actualFile(f.actualFile) {}
00062   CacheFile(const String& name, ref<VFile> actualFile)
00063     : VFile(PathName(name)), actualFile(actualFile) {}
00064 
00065   friend class CacheDirectory;
00066   friend class VFileSystem;
00067 };
00068 
00069 } // base

00071 #endif
